keyMappings:
# Useful extension to make vimium working 
# on new pages (need set custom non-browser page)
# https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/new-tab-redirect/icpgjfneehieebagbmdbhnlpiopdcmna/related



# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap <a-p>
map zp togglePinTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# If you have issues with redirects (l search) use this extension
# https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/skip-redirect/jaoafjdoijdconemdmodhbfpianehlon/related?hl=en
l: https://www.google.com/search?btnI=1&q=%s I'm feeling lucky...

y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
